ovdesc.p: This application holds all of the positions held in T24 for products tradeable in the DX module.
The key is complex, details of the structure of this key can be found in the Derivatives manual.

desc.p: A NOINPUT field which holds the first character of option style value in DX.TRADE.
This will hold the value either ‘A’ for American, ‘E’ for European or ‘C’ for Carribean options
The number of lots traded prior to any closeout or corporate action taking place.

Region code which applies to this position - this will have been defined in the relevant DX.EXCHANGE.MASTER record in the REGION field.
Regions exist to segregate a Region within a Country where the public holidays differ from other parts of the Country.
This enables a separate HOLIDAY table to be defined for the Region, to allow delivery to be controlled within the T24 system.
